document_data.name: Hu
document_data.mainbody: '''Hu''' was a sea captain in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hu was a [[Wanese]] captain in service to the mercantile [[Ko clan]], commanding the ''[[Victorious Morning]]'' ship.
document_data.History: In 1358 DR, he was ordered to take [[Ko La Ko]] and an adventuring party hired by [[Ko Ho San]] to [[H'sin-to]], at the mouth of the [[Fenghsintzu River]] in [[T'u Lung]].
document_data.Personality: Hu was a hot-tempered individual. A long time living outside his country made him even forget his true Wa-an name.
